com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.delegate

Interface ActivityMvpDelegate<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of MvpView
    P - The type of MvpPresenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityMvpDelegateImpl, ActivityMvpViewStateDelegateImpl

    public interface ActivityMvpDelegate<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
    A delegate for Activities to attach them to mosbies mvp.

    The following methods must be invoked from the corresponding Activities lifecycle methods:

    • onCreate(Bundle)
    • onDestroy()
    • onPause()
    • onResume()
    • onStart()
    • onStop()
    • onRestart()
    • onContentChanged()
    • onSaveInstanceState(Bundle)
    • onPostCreate(Bundle)

    Since:
    1.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        void onCreate(Bundle bundle)
        This method must be called from Activity#onCreate(Bundle). This method internally creates the presenter and attaches the view to it.

      • onDestroy

        void onDestroy()
        This method must be called from Activity#onDestroy()}. This method internally detaches the view from presenter

        This method must be called from Activity#onPause()

      • onRetainCustomNonConfigurationInstance

        java.lang.Object onRetainCustomNonConfigurationInstance()

        Returns:
        Don't forget to return the value returned by this delegate method
